author: n0price
content:
Thanks, so if the val key is loaded on the client, the pre exit can be generated before funding the vals? 
In addition you can generate the pre exit without using the index according to the doc here by using the MNEMONIC and only the public key of the validator  https://github.com/eth-educators/ethstaker-guides/blob/main/voluntary-exit.md#required-details

author: jgm
content: No.  You cannot create a validator exit transaction before it has an on-chain index (mnemonic indices are totally different).

author: n0price
content: Ok and index is assigned when the validator key is funded or only when the concensus client loaded the key?

author: jgm
content: When the deposit is recognized on the beacon chain (the "pending" state at https://www.attestant.io/posts/understanding-the-validator-lifecycle/)

author: n0price
content: One more thing the documentation that I shared gives the impression that you can just replace the index with the public key to generate the pre-signed exit offline.

author: jgm
content: It's from github; feel free to raise an issue or PR to address that (but it isn't anything to do with this discord so I doubt anyone here can do anything about it).
